about_the_game:
Welcome to Bangalore!

Step into the driver’s seat of your auto rickshaw and explore the open-world city of Bangalore. 

What to look for?

  • Explore Bangalore - Drive through the streets of Bangalore, visit iconic neighborhoods and experience a living, breathing city brought to life.

  • Ride and Relax - Complete trips at your own pace while listening to the radio with an extensive library of songs or add your own favorites to create the perfect vibe for your rides.

  • Conquer the City: Want more than trips? Take on 7 rival auto drivers, each dominating a part of Bangalore. Defeat them one-by-one to prove your skill and claim the title of the number 1 auto driver in Bangalore.

And hey, isn’t it better to conquer Bangalore’s traffic from the comfort of your chair than being stuck in it for real?

Whether you’re here for adrenaline-filled races or peaceful exploration, the choice is yours.

name: Bangalore Daze

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hop into your auto rickshaw and explore the open-world driving adventure set in the streets of Bangalore. Take relaxing rides through iconic neighborhoods or challenge yourself to conquer the streets by facing off against rival auto drivers. The city is yours to navigate—choose your journey.
